name: Hypstitud
description:
Your goal is to help Mustach' to reach the Hypster's cup on the top floor.

  • Use the left / right arrow key to move
  • V to fight ennemies with your mustache
  • and Up arrow to climb to the ladder.

You had to kill at least 5 hypsters by floor to see the ladder of the next floor !

Good luck ;-)

This game was coded on Pico-8 for the WHGJ (Weekly Hour Game Jam - W6 2017)

with the thematic : Hypsterism !
